mapper.select: select rpad(substr(userid,0,2),length(userid),'*') as userid1, userid from member where username=#{username} and phone1=#{phone1} and phone2=#{phone2} and phone3=#{phone3} and email1=#{email1} and email2=#{email2}
mapper.update: update member set username=#{username}, passwd=#{passwd}, birthday = #{birthday}, addr1 =#{addr1}, addr2 =#{addr2}, phone1 =#{phone1}, phone2 =#{phone2}, phone3 =#{phone3}, email1 = #{email1}, email2 = #{email2}, gradeno=#{gradeno}, reception=#{reception} where userid = #{userid}
